19 Playable Music/Sound Effects Clips! Put It In Your CD Player!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Hop-A-Bout Archive (PSOne): 19 Playable Music/Sound Effects Clips! Put It In Your CD Player!
By Lisa Shock on Friday, December 1, 2000 - 03:14 pm:

Avoid Track 1, that's the game data (you'll only hear a loud POP.) -but the following 19 tracks are relentlessly cute songs and sound effects from the game! Pretty cool little extra, I wish MR2 had some music tracks on it....(still trying to buy the soundtrack)

By danz on Monday, December 31, 2001 - 04:33 pm:

this works with almost all playstation cds: if you put them in your cd player you can occaisonally get them to play songs, however allways avoid track 1 as lisa said (sometimes the last track should also be avoided) this also works with both warcraft2 and the expansion (works for lots more too!)
